# Self-introduction

I will introduce my education background and experience.

## Eduation background
I graduated with a bachelor's degree in Mathematics and Economics from New York University. Currently, I am pursuing my studies in Biostatistics at Columbia University.

## Experience
During my academic journey, I had the opportunity to intern at Merck, where I was primarily responsible for analyzing and processing data related to the launch of new vaccine mobile applications.
